name: Golub Capital BDC, Inc.
description: Golub Capital BDC, Inc. is a leading business development company that specializes in providing flexible financing solutions to middle-market companies in the United States. Established in 2001 and headquartered in New York City, Golub Capital focuses on investing in senior secured loans, mezzanine debt, and equity in companies across various sectors. The firm aims to generate attractive risk-adjusted returns for its shareholders while supporting the growth of its portfolio companies. With a deep understanding of the middle-market landscape, Golub Capital leverages its extensive network and expertise to identify and execute investment opportunities. The company is committed to maintaining a diversified investment portfolio, which helps mitigate risks and enhance stability in fluctuating market conditions. Golub Capital BDC also emphasizes strong relationships with its borrowers and works closely with management teams to drive operational improvements and strategic initiatives. The company’s disciplined investment approach, combined with its focus on credit quality, positions it as a trusted partner for businesses seeking capital to fuel their growth ambitions. As a publicly traded entity, Golub Capital BDC is dedicated to transparency and accountability, ensuring that it delivers value to its investors and stakeholders.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
